original_text: And they shall scoff at the kings, and the princes shall be a scorn unto them: they shall deride every strong hold; for they shall heap dust, and take it.
korean_text: 왕들을 멸시하며 방백을 조소하며 모든 견고한 성들을 비웃고 흉벽을 쌓아 그것을 점령할 것이라

sentences.original_text: And they shall scoff at the kings
and the princes shall be a scorn unto them
They shall deride every strong hold

sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 흙을 쌓아 올릴 것이기 때문이라
